mapper.select: CALL PC_AC_CLOSDATA_STAT ( #{accPrid, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorCode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorMsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closDataList, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=closDataResult} )

SELECT CA.ARTI_CD ,ACNT.ACNT_CD ,ACNT.ACNT_NM ,CASE WHEN CA.CLOS_ACNT_CD = ACNT.ACNT_CD THEN CA.CLOS_ACNT_ABS ELSE CA.OPP_ACNT_ABS END AS ACNT_ABS ,CASE WHEN CA.CLOS_ACNT_CD = ACNT.ACNT_CD THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS CRE_DEB_DIV ,NULL AS DEB_AMT ,NULL AS CRE_AMT ,AP.ACC_PRID ,AP.END_DATE AS GIPYO_DATE FROM AC_CLOS_ACNT CA ,AE_ACC_ACNT ACNT ,AE_ACC_PRID AP WHERE AP.ACC_PRID = #{accPrid}
AND ARTI_CD IN (${artiCd})
AND ARTI_CD IN ('')
AND SUBSTR(AP.START_DATE,0,4) = ACNT.ACC_YEAR AND (CA.CLOS_ACNT_CD = ACNT.ACNT_CD OR CA.OPP_ACNT_CD = ACNT.ACNT_CD ) ORDER BY CA.ARTI_CD
